医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
六价疫苗可以减少百日咳的传播埃丝特·纳卡齐 (Esther Nakkazi) 写道，全面覆盖六价疫苗可以预防百日咳和脊髓灰质炎，避免疾病复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Hexavalent-vaccine-can-reduce-spread-of-whooping-cough.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Hexavalent-vaccine-can-reduce-spread-of-whooping-cough.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8d39b3a-c3d7-42e8-aeb5-bfaddd6c6e70 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:58:12 -0500 Hexavalent vaccine can reduce spread of whooping cough
新的 NCCN 指南包括扩大对各种癌症的遗传风险评估国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN)——一个由领先癌症中心组成的联盟，专注于维持以证据为基础的专家共识驱动的护理指南——宣布出版扩展版 NCCN 肿瘤学临床实践指南（NCCN 指南）的遗传/家族性疾病高风险评估：乳房、卵巢、胰腺和前列腺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-NCCN-guidelines-include-expanded-genic-risk-assessment-for-various-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-NCCN-guidelines-include-expanded-genic-risk-assessment-for-various-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bb1c020-44ed-497d-8a4f-e256ff6354af Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:55:00 -0500 New NCCN guidelines include expanded genetic risk assessment for various cancers
浆果味电子烟会损害肺部免疫反应接触浆果味电子烟后，AM 功能发生改变，导致对病原体的免疫反应不佳并降低宿主存活率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Berry-flavored-vapes-impair-lung-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Berry-flavored-vapes-impair-lung-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62ea7de6-02a7-4721-afd8-051a87f511a3 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:51:00 -0500 Berry-flavored vapes impair lung immune response
研究人员发现 41 个与椎间盘突出症相关的新基因区域腰椎间盘突出症是下背部最常见的结构变化之一，也是腿部放射痛或坐骨神经痛的最常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Researchers-find-41-new-genic-regions-linked-to-disc-herniations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Researchers-find-41-new-genic-regions-linked-to-disc-herniations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=520b30f5-c43a-4c4b-a7f7-da484e97975a Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:50:08 -0500 Researchers find 41 new genetic regions linked to disc herniations
研究将日光浴床的使用与新英格兰黑色素瘤发病率上升联系起来在美国，黑色素瘤仅占皮肤癌的 1%，但却导致皮肤癌死亡人数最多。研究人员评估了新英格兰日光浴床的可用性和使用与黑色素瘤发病率上升之间的潜在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-links-tanning-bed-use-to-rising-melanoma-rates-in-New-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Study-links-tanning-bed-use-to-rising-melanoma-rates-in-New-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33f1a9ce-9d89-48dd-b75c-1d7a0f743b68 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:38:46 -0500 Study links tanning bed use to rising melanoma rates in New England
适体与基因药物客户延长协议Aptamer 的 Optimer 技术在遗传医学递送、增强靶向特异性并推进临床前研究方面实现了关键里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Aptamer-extends-agreement-with-genic-medicines-customer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Aptamer-extends-agreement-with-genic-medicines-customer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4a3a395-2fdc-4c05-9a9e-75238156ae9a Thu, 07 Nov 2024 09:29:00 -0500 Aptamer extends agreement with genetic medicines customer
维生素 D 可以帮助 COVID-19 患者吗？荟萃分析强调了 ICU 减少的潜力根据最近的研究，维生素 D 可能会降低 COVID-19 患者的 ICU 和插管率，对老年和重症病例有显着益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Could-vitamin-D-help-COVID-19-患者-Meta-analysis-highlights-pottial-ICU-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Could-vitamin-D-help-COVID-19-患者-Meta-analysis-highlights-pottial-ICU-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48d6c3d3-3abc-4382-a68f-45b968db189c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 08:58:00 -0500 Could vitamin D help COVID-19 patients? Meta-analysis highlights potential ICU reduction
运动可以消除久坐带来的健康风险吗？新研究表明剧烈活动有助于一项研究表明，每天 30 分钟的剧烈运动可能会抵消久坐带来的一些衰老影响，这凸显了减少久坐行为的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Can-exercise-undo-sittings-health-risks-New-study-suggests-vigorous-activity-helps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Can-exercise-undo-sittings-health-risks-New-study-suggests-vigorous-activity-helps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43b7c92a-0114-4c72-be65-dbbb45cb00ce Thu, 07 Nov 2024 08:28:00 -0500 Can exercise undo sitting's health risks? New study suggests vigorous activity helps
生酮饮食与肠道微生物和癫痫儿童癫痫发作减少有关生酮饮食对儿童的抗癫痫作用可能受到肠道细菌和代谢物的影响，凸显了它们在癫痫治疗中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Ketogenic-diet-linked-to-gut-microbes-and-seizure-reduction-in-epileptic-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Ketogenic-diet-linked-to-gut-microbes-and-seizure-reduction-in-epileptic-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9989c3f8-20e0-4e0c-831d-eb4e9f1fb042 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 07:51:00 -0500 Ketogenic diet linked to gut microbes and seizure reduction in epileptic children
部落卫生领导人表示，联邦政府尚未将梅毒疫情视为突发公共卫生事件娜塔莉·霍尔特几乎到处都能看到南达科他州长达数年的梅毒疫情造成的严重伤亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Tribal-health-leaders-say-feds-havene28099t-treatment-syphilis-outbreak-as-a-public-health-emergency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Tribal-health-leaders-say-feds-havene28099t-treatment-syphilis-outbreak-as-a-public-health-emergency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=342c3965-236a-4ad6-b514-1742bca8e119 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 07:08:00 -0500 Tribal health leaders say feds haven’t treated syphilis outbreak as a public health emergency
